description: This dataset determines the extent to which lending operations are gender-informed on three dimensions: analysis, actions and monitoring and evaluation. It is updated on an annual basis. (See Documents:  Methodology Guidance note with Checklist and Examples https://databox.worldbank.org/api/assets/D55E8B5A-4A57-48F6-AB35-216B4DA9305B ; and Glossary & Acronyms https://databox.worldbank.org/api/assets/D1BC5724-908B-4255-9195-EE4133CC0655).

name: Monitoring Gender Mainstreaming In World Bank Lending Operations
